comment: Teacher provided text. Not an easy A, but he makes you work enough to understand. He is much better than other programming teachers.

Great guy, good professor. Lots of busy work to keep up with but he will push back due dates if you ask. Quizzes lay out material for tests so keep your quizzes and the quizzes are based on the TEXTBOOK chapters not the PowerPoints, I wish someone told me that going in but I would take him again for sure. He also kind of looks like Kanye West

Way too much homework, he grades very harshly, especially for someone that seems lost, and doesn't under Java himself. I'm working on a Masters, and wouldn't recommend taking this class to anyone. Blows through lectures w/out really developing the concept.
Great teacher! The class is really easy if you read the chapters and do the labs and assignments. If you do that, you will pass all the tests and quizzes as well. Gives extra credit for attendance.
Java 101. Great teacher. Always there to help when needed. Grades assignments in a timely manner. Put time and effort into your work and you'll pass.

Class is easy but lots of busy work. Quizzes, HW, discussions, tests, and a 10-15 page research paper (8% of your grade). HW is answer the end of chapter questions, and you will have written about 30 pages on this alone for homework.  I wish he participated in the discussions online. Material is dry. Easy to get a B but lot of work for the A.
Do the work and you will pass the class. Quizzes and Test are not hard. Keep up with the questions at the end of each chapter or you will be crunched for time at the end of the semester.

Great teacher who went the extra mile to be sure everyone had what they needed to do the work. Responds to requests for help quickly. He is very knowledgeable about the subject matter and is enthusiastic about teaching what he knows. I will definitely take other classes with him

All power points, materials and test questions are online and probably supplied by the makers of the book so he's almost a glorified grader but that being said his response time to student questions is almost immediate, he knows the material very well himself to help clarify anything and the class structure is easy.
Very cool guy and extremely helpful every step of the way. All course work can be done in class and an A should be earned with minimal effort
He is really a very thoughtful professor and you can easily earn an A in this course if you do all the assignment. The quizzes he offers are very easy.

Easy professor, he asks for basics. Very patiend and nice. Responds to emails or texts quickly. Take him, do the homework assignments (he has lots of these) be there for the quizzes and you will get an A.
online class was very easy. Do the discussion questions, homework, quizzes, and tests in timely fashion, and you will be fine! I highly recommend this teacher!

He is an outstanding professor for helping people learn basic programs on the computer such as word,excel, and powerpoint, I already knew the majority of the class but he helped me learn even more about each program. He takes role each class but always let us out early as long as we had some of our work done. Definitely recommend him!!!
